title: Scenic Sites of South Korea
text: Scenic Sites (명승, 名勝) of <a href="South%20Korea">South Korea</a> are "Places of natural beauty with great historic, artistic or scenic values, which feature distinctive uniqueness and rarity originated from their formation processes" so designated by the <a href="Cultural%20Heritage%20Administration">Cultural Heritage Administration</a>, an agency of the <a href="Government%20of%20South%20Korea">South Korean government</a>. The first was designated in 1979 and, as of 2020, 115 Scenic Sites have designated at a national level:
